An optional configuration object for `getFormData`<!-- -->.


{ \[key: string\]: unknown; }

</td><td>


</td><td>

string\[\]


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Cherry-pick the form fields you want. Useful in very large forms where only a few fields are required. Does \*\*not\*\* affect `additionalEntries`<!-- -->.
